section.p:
Here you will learn how to :
set a predefined property
create own property
edit and/or delete properties
Select a file from the 'Solution Explorer', right click it and select 'edit properties'. You are now ready to set, edit or delete properties. If the file you selected already had a property, the list will populate itself. If you are uncertain what a property is, and how it works; look under the 'keywords' section under Properties

list.item: 1. Select a item from the dropdown menu. Or you can define your own propertie by typing it directly in the "name" field. See next picture.
1. Type in the name of the property
2. Type in the value(s) of the propertie. Use a new line (ENTER) to differentiate between values.
3. Press 'Add' to store the propertie and the value(s). The propertie will be shown in the list at the bottom

2. Select the propertie you want to work with from this list by double clicking it. The apropriet propertie screen will automaticaly be loaded, with values. Make your changes. And store them with 'Add'.
3. Deletes the property selected from the list (2.)

section.p: When you are finnished defining all the properties, select 'Save'. All the properties are now stored and ready to use.
